channel.title: Blogs on aaron lightner
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on aaron lightner

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Thanks for stopping by my academic weblog, which will be dedicated to reporting on new research, projects I’m involved in, and data analysis in R. As a social scientist, I will also post discussions about anything that interests me as a researcher, or with interesting applications to my own fields (anthropology, cognitive science) or adjacent fields. I am hoping this will be a platform for writing out and sharpening up some newer ideas, which might include migrating from disorganized text files in my local directories to a more public context.
